description: You are standing in beautiful room with a view of the beach, just a few meeters outside. You are feeling more relaxed already.

flower.title: Flower
flower.description: A white lily are placed in the room and gives of a nice smell.
flower.smellMessage: A wonderful mix of sweet and fruity.

coffee.title: Coffee cup
coffee.description: Hm, someone has just left a cup of coffee for you? How nice of them.
coffee.smellMessage: Oh that scent of Java in the morning!

sink.title: Sink
sink.description: This green sink seems to have been cleaned recently...

television.title: Television
television.description: The television seems to be turned of at the moment.
television.useMessage: I don't think you should turn on the TV right now, someone might here you?

egg.title: Egg
egg.description: This brown egg does look mighty fine, but you are not hungry.

sky.title: Sky
sky.description: The weather seems nice today, how about going for a swim?

bed.title: Bed
bed.description: Oh, nicely done bed! It's to bright to sleep right now...

sunbed.title: Sunbed
sunbed.description: Oh my god, that looks comfy enough for you. How about a day just chillin'?
sunbed.useMessage: I don't think they want to use their sunbed...

buns.title: Buns
buns.description: Hm do you think they will notice if I only take one?
buns.smellMessage: Oh they smell lovely, gimmi some buns!!

title: Beach House
